entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow beginning early this evening. Amount 15 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
